meanings.definition: A person who is not skilled in or does not participate in making music.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a nonmusician, so he prefers listening to podcasts instead of playing instruments.
meanings.sent2: The nonmusician enjoyed the concert, even though they couldn't play any instruments themselves.
meanings.sent3: The nonmusician tried to play the guitar, but ended up making more noise than music!
meanings.sent4: In a world full of talented musicians, he felt like a nonmusician lost in a symphony.
meanings.sent5: The nonmusician's lack of musical ability made them stand out in a choir of skilled singers.
